title: Ticket #7050: Failure to write credential request not propagated to user
description:
If, for example, the permissions of the SEC_CREDENTIAL_DIRECTORY are set incorrectly which CREDD_OAUTH_MODE=true, then a failure to write the credential request file (the file the CredD writes and the CREDMON consumes) is not propagated to the user, and their job is succesfully submitted even thought the job will not have the requested tokens.

The administrator may notice the error in the CredLog, but in this case of a misconfiguration the job should not be allowed to be submitted.
